pages.text: The Reactor Glass is essentially like the $(l:misc_blocks/structural_glss)Structural Glass$(/l), but is necessary for reactors if you wish to have a glass wall since you cannot use $(l:misc_blocks/structural_glss)Structural Glass$(/l) for reactors.$(p)Other than that, there is no real difference. It can also substitute for $(l:misc_blocks/structural_glss)Structural Glass$(/l) in other multiblock structures too if you wish.
